ARABIC: كُلُّ ذَٰلِكَ كَانَ سَيِّئُهُۥ عِندَ رَبِّكَ مَكْرُوهًا

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: All of that is evil action and hateful in the sight of your Lord.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: All these are evil and odious to your Lord.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: The wickedness of each of that is hateful to your Lord.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: All such things are sins and detestable in the sight of your Lord.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Of all this related before, the evil among it is disliked by your Lord.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: All the bad aspects of these (the above mentioned things) are hateful to your Lord.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: All this-- the evil of it-- is hateful in the sight of your Lord.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: All of that -- the wickedness of it is hateful in the sight of thy Lord has revealed to thee:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: The evil of all that is hateful in the sight of thy Lord.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: All that is evil in the sight of your Lord, and is detestable.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Each of these--theyice thereof is unto thy Lord ever detestable.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: The evil of all these is detestable to your Lord.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Of all such things the evil is hateful in the sight of thy Lord.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: All the bad aspects of these (the above mentioned things) are hateful to your Lord.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: The wickedness of all this is hateful with your Lord.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: The evil of all these is disliked by your Lord.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: All that - its evil is ever, in the sight of your Lord, detested.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [17:38] All of that, [which has been] mentioned — the evil of it is hateful in the sight of your Lord.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (The evil of all that) from which I have prohibited you (is hateful in the sight of thy Lord) is bad and hateful in the sight of your Lord.
